author: mmahut
title: Open-sourcing Blockfrost API
description: Blockfrost is the most used API as a Service in the Cardano ecosystem trusted by thousands of developers, but it is not open source.
solution: We would like to, with the help of this awesome community, open-source Blockfrost backend.
experience: We are the creators of Blockfrost, creating services and tools lowering barriers to entry for developers.
